name: docker-linter
description: Lint perl, python and/or ruby in your docker containers.
author: Henrik Sjööh <hello@enhenrik.nu> (http://www.enhenrik.nu)

docker-linter.perl.enable.description: Control whether perl compile linting is enabled for perl files.

docker-linter.perl.machine.description: The name of the docker-machine in which you run your containers.

docker-linter.perl.container.description: The name of the docker container in which you want to run your linting.

docker-linter.perl.command.description: The command to which the buffer contents is sent.

docker-linter.perl.regexp.description: The regex that is is used to match for errors.

docker-linter.perl.message.description: The number of the group that matches the error.

docker-linter.perl.line.description: The number of the group that matches the line.

docker-linter.perl.column.description: The number of the group that matches the column.

docker-linter.perl.severity.description: The number of the group that matches the severity.

docker-linter.perl.code.description: The number of the group that matches the code.

docker-linter.perlcritic.enable.description: Control whether perlcritic linting is enabled for perl files.

docker-linter.perlcritic.machine.description: The name of the docker-machine in which you run your containers.

docker-linter.perlcritic.container.description: The name of the docker container in which you want to run your linting.

docker-linter.perlcritic.command.description: The command to which the buffer contents is sent.

docker-linter.perlcritic.regexp.description: The regex that is is used to match for errors.

docker-linter.perlcritic.message.description: The number of the group that matches the error.

docker-linter.perlcritic.line.description: The number of the group that matches the line.

docker-linter.perlcritic.column.description: The number of the group that matches the column.

docker-linter.perlcritic.severity.description: The number of the group that matches the severity.

docker-linter.perlcritic.code.description: The number of the group that matches the code.

docker-linter.flake8.enable.description: Control whether flake8 linting is enabled for python files or not.

docker-linter.flake8.machine.description: The name of the docker-machine in which you run your containers.

docker-linter.flake8.container.description: The name of the docker container in which you want to run your linting.

docker-linter.flake8.command.description: The command to which the buffer contents is sent.

docker-linter.flake8.regexp.description: The regex that is is used to match for errors.

docker-linter.flake8.message.description: The number of the group that matches the error.

docker-linter.flake8.line.description: The number of the group that matches the line.

docker-linter.flake8.column.description: The number of the group that matches the column.

docker-linter.flake8.severity.description: The number of the group that matches the severity.

docker-linter.flake8.code.description: The number of the group that matches the code.

docker-linter.rubocop.enable.description: Control whether rubocop linting is enabled for ruby files or not.

docker-linter.rubocop.machine.description: The name of the docker-machine in which you run your containers.

docker-linter.rubocop.container.description: The name of the docker container in which you want to run your linting.

docker-linter.rubocop.command.description: The command to which the buffer contents is sent.

docker-linter.rubocop.regexp.description: The regex that is is used to match for errors.

docker-linter.rubocop.message.description: The number of the group that matches the error.

docker-linter.rubocop.line.description: The number of the group that matches the line.

docker-linter.rubocop.column.description: The number of the group that matches the column.

docker-linter.rubocop.severity.description: The number of the group that matches the severity.

docker-linter.rubocop.code.description: The number of the group that matches the code.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd ../docker-linter-server && npm run compile && cd ../docker-linter && node ./node_modules/vscode/bin/compile
